nodes.documentation:
@title DydxPoolController
@dev This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from dYdX liquidity pools.
nodes.name: DydxPoolController

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the fund's balance of the specified currency in the dYdX pool.
nodes.name: getBalance
approve

function (uint256) pure returns (struct Actions.ActionArgs memory[] memory)
function (struct Account.Info memory[] memory,struct Actions.ActionArgs memory[] memory) external

@dev Withdraws all funds from the dYdX pool.
@return Boolean indicating success.
